name: AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) Orchestrator
description: The AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) Universal Orchestrator extension enables automated management of SSL/TLS certificates across AWS services, including tasks such as inventory, addition, and removal of certificates.

store_types.Name: AWS Certificate Manager
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The AWS Role that will be used for access, which will be assumed to apply its permissions to all orchestrator actions. Example: 'arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/ACMAccess'
store_types.StorePathDescription: The AWS Region, or a comma-separated list of multiple regions, where the store will operate. Example: 'us-east-1,us-west-2'
